refnamediv.refpurpose: Functions operating on a single palette.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Functions operating on a single palette.

refsect2.title: gimp_palette_new ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new palette
This procedure creates a new, uninitialized palette

listitem.simpara: The requested name of the new palette.

refsect2.para: Since GIMP 2.2

refsect2.title: gimp_palette_duplicate ()
refsect2.para: Duplicates a palette
This procedure creates an identical palette by a different name

listitem.simpara: The name of the palette's copy.

refsect2.para: Since GIMP 2.2

refsect2.title: gimp_palette_rename ()
refsect2.para: Rename a palette
This procedure renames a palette

listitem.simpara: The new name of the palette.
The actual new name of the palette.

refsect2.para: Since GIMP 2.2

refsect2.title: gimp_palette_delete ()
refsect2.para: Deletes a palette
This procedure deletes a palette
Since GIMP 2.2

refsect2.title: gimp_palette_get_info ()
refsect2.para: Retrieve information about the specified palette.
This procedure retrieves information about the specified palette. This includes the name, and the number of colors.

listitem.simpara: The number of colors in the palette.

refsect2.para: Since GIMP 2.2

refsect2.title: gimp_palette_get_colors ()
refsect2.para: Gets all colors from the specified palette.
This procedure retrieves all color entries of the specified palette.
Since GIMP 2.6

refsect2.title: gimp_palette_get_columns ()
refsect2.para: Retrieves the number of columns to use to display this palette
This procedures retrieves the prefered number of columns to use when the palette is being displayed.

listitem.simpara: The number of columns used to display this palette.

refsect2.para: Since GIMP 2.4

refsect2.title: gimp_palette_set_columns ()
refsect2.para: Sets the number of columns to use when displaying the palette
This procedures allows to control how many colors are shown per row when the palette is being displayed. This value can only be changed if the palette is writable. The maximum allowed value is 64.
Since GIMP 2.4

refsect2.title: gimp_palette_add_entry ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean gimp_palette_add_entry (const gchar *name, const gchar *entry_name, const GimpRGB *color, gint *entry_num);
refsect2.para: Adds a palette entry to the specified palette.
This procedure adds an entry to the specifed palette. It returns an error if the entry palette does not exist.

listitem.simpara: The index of the added entry.

refsect2.para: Since GIMP 2.2

refsect2.title: gimp_palette_delete_entry ()
refsect2.para: Deletes a palette entry from the specified palette.
This procedure deletes an entry from the specifed palette. It returns an error if the entry palette does not exist.

listitem.simpara: The index of the added entry.

refsect2.para: Since GIMP 2.2

refsect2.title: gimp_palette_entry_get_color ()
refsect2.para: Gets the specified palette entry from the specified palette.
This procedure retrieves the color of the zero-based entry specifed for the specified palette. It returns an error if the entry does not exist.
Since GIMP 2.2

refsect2.title: gimp_palette_entry_set_color ()
refsect2.para: Sets the specified palette entry in the specified palette.
This procedure sets the color of the zero-based entry specifed for the specified palette. It returns an error if the entry does not exist.
Since GIMP 2.2

refsect2.title: gimp_palette_entry_get_name ()
refsect2.para: Gets the specified palette entry from the specified palette.
This procedure retrieves the name of the zero-based entry specifed for the specified palette. It returns an error if the entry does not exist.
Since GIMP 2.2

refsect2.title: gimp_palette_entry_set_name ()
refsect2.para: Sets the specified palette entry in the specified palette.
This procedure sets the name of the zero-based entry specifed for the specified palette. It returns an error if the entry does not exist.
Since GIMP 2.2

refsect2.title: gimp_palette_get_foreground ()

warning.para: gimp_palette_get_foreground is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Get the current GIMP foreground color.
This procedure retrieves the current GIMP foreground color. The foreground color is used in a variety of tools such as paint tools, blending, and bucket fill.

refsect2.title: gimp_palette_get_background ()

warning.para: gimp_palette_get_background is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Get the current GIMP background color.
This procedure retrieves the current GIMP background color. The background color is used in a variety of tools such as blending, erasing (with non-alpha images), and image filling.

refsect2.title: gimp_palette_set_foreground ()

warning.para: gimp_palette_set_foreground is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Set the current GIMP foreground color.
This procedure sets the current GIMP foreground color. After this is set, operations which use foreground such as paint tools, blending, and bucket fill will use the new value.

refsect2.title: gimp_palette_set_background ()

warning.para: gimp_palette_set_background is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Set the current GIMP background color.

This procedure sets the current GIMP background color. After this is set, operations which use background such as blending, filling images, clearing, and erasing (in non-alpha images) will use the new value.

refsect2.title: gimp_palette_set_default_colors ()

warning.para: gimp_palette_set_default_colors is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Set the current GIMP foreground and background colors to black and white.
This procedure sets the current GIMP foreground and background colors to their initial default values, black and white.

refsect2.title: gimp_palette_swap_colors ()

warning.para: gimp_palette_swap_colors is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Swap the current GIMP foreground and background colors.
This procedure swaps the current GIMP foreground and background colors, so that the new foreground color becomes the old background color and vice versa.

refsect2.title: gimp_palette_is_editable ()
refsect2.para: Tests if palette can be edited
Returns TRUE if you have permission to change the palette

listitem.simpara: TRUE if the palette can be edited.

refsect2.para: Since GIMP 2.4
